posts.title: My favorite quotes
posts.body: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself. That is something you have charge of.

posts.title: My Day
posts.body: This is one of the strangest day of my life

posts.title: Weird Weather
posts.body: Yesterday is Sunny, then it Snow all of a sudden

posts.title: What happen to me today?!
posts.body: I was really really tired today, but all is well!
